biotools.summary: The R2 platform is an online genomics analysis tool which can analyze a large collection of public data, but also allows shielded analysis of your own microarray dataset. freely accessible and intended to be used by biologists, even those with little or no bioinformatics training.

bioschemas.name: R2 platform
bioschemas.summary: The R2 platform is an online genomics analysis tool which can analyze a large collection of public data, but also allows shielded analysis of your own microarray dataset. freely accessible and intended to be used by biologists, even those with little or no bioinformatics training.
